description: Provides ICNR Tunnel. Inter-Configuration Network Routing connects networks from different environments to a single, shared server. Without ICNR, environments are on isolated networks.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Source.description: Source network from where the connection was initiated. This network does not need to be “tunnelable” (visible to other networks).

Target.description: Target network to which the connection was made. The network needs to be “tunnelable” (visible to other networks).
